Description.LocalizedString:
Dozens of security measures were applied across the ship’s equipment, and many of them were in a state of disrepair.

  • The reboot timer when the EMP affects the Biopods is reduced by 15%.

A byproduct of the microfission reactors powering cryo and life support. Even a tiny leak would prove disastrous for onboard sensors.

  • Supply cases' aura distance is reduced by 8 meters.

A kid’s baseball glove owned by one of the colonists. His memories of a youth playing catch were implanted.

  • Overclock Mode duration is increased by 15%.

Made for the organics, this disgusting concoction works well to nourish any organic matter.

  • Get 2 extra Biopods.

A device that gives highly accurate information on the lay of the land.

  • Reveals the auras of Survivors who pick up an EMP for 6 seconds.

A device that can find the flaws in constructed objects. Intended to help with repair.

  • During Overclock Mode, your attacks inflict the Mangled status effect.

    • Mangled increases time required to heal by 25% and lasts until fully healed.

Destroying the other HUX units not only made his extermination of humans easier, it gave him more parts to work with.

  • Slipstream infection range between Survivors is increased by 2 meters.

After extracting the other colonists’ DNA, he burned their remains.

  • Survivors afflicted with Temporal Slipstream suffer from Blindness.
    • Blindness prevents survivors from seeing auras.

Xenobotanists would have a field day with these strange samples of alien plant life.

  • Decreases the penalty duration when stunned with a pallet after a successful Slipstream teleport by 20%.

Unconnected wires attached to a live current that have a tendency to deliver a shocking surprise.

  • A Survivor who is cleansed of Slipstream screams, interrupting their current action.

A no-friction gel applied to crew members before entering deep cryo sleep.

  • Slipstream spreads between Survivors 25% faster.

Despite the advent of light speed technology, it seemed nothing could make bureaucracy any faster.

  • At the start of the trial, EMPs take 30 seconds longer to generate.
  • All survivors start the match Slipstreamed.

A crystal from the alien structure that gave him sentience.
  • When a Biopod is created, the auras of all Survivors within 6 meters of that Biopod are revealed to you for 6 seconds.

    • “HELLO WORLD.” - Hux

A limitation of organic hearing is a limited aural spectrum. Expanding that range is like gaining an entirely new sense.

  • After 0.5 seconds, you can hear all sounds through the Biopods.

Without air to breathe, organics don’t last long.

  • When a survivor becomes Slipstreamed, they are Exhausted for 6 seconds.

    • Exhausted prevents Survivors from activating exhausting perks.

A gel that can heal wounds extremely quickly. However, the machines in it have a history of being hacked to hurt people too.

  • During Overclock Mode, your attacks inflict the Broken status effect for 30 seconds.

    • Broken prevents Survivors from being healed.

Used by crew members during long shifts to avoid lapses in focus. Side effects of overuse include paranoia and, in extreme cases, hallucination.

  • While a Survivor is Slipstreamed, they hear the Terror Radius as if you were nearby.

Originally used for communication and entertainment, this has been repurposed for obfuscation.

  • After a successful Slipstream teleport from a Biopod, the target Survivor suffers from the Oblivious status effect for 60 seconds.

    • Oblivious prevents Survivors from hearing or being affected by the Killer's Terror Radius.

A sentimental object that grounds someone to an imagined past.

  • Gives 5% Haste after a Successful Slipstream teleport. Decreases the Overclock Mode duration by 20%.

    • Haste increases Killer movement speed.

    “YOUR ATTACHMENT TO ILLUSIONS IS WEAKNESS.” - Hux

A complete list of biographical data on the entire crew of the ship sent to Dvarka.

  • When a Survivor is Slipstreamed by a Biopod or another Survivor, you see their aura for 8 seconds. Slipstream infection range between Survivors is increased by 2 meters.
